paragraphs.body: The smoke released by the grenades is harmless, and although it creates effective cover, the concealing effects do not last long. The grenade itself can be rendered useless by preventing the smoke from being released, such as by freezing the canister using waterbending; should the smoke be released, it can be easily blown away by a gust of wind, thus making the grenade useless against an ${link_0}.
